resources.string: The Novice level corresponds to an arithmetic expression involving exactly 2 integers. The Easy level gives a maximum 3 terms expression.The Medium level gives a maximum 4 and minimum 2 terms expression.The Guru level gives maximum 6 and minimum 4 terms expression.
This app is developed by M.A.S.Iddamalgoda (2012519).amila922@gmail.com

This is a basic brain training game which will be asking you to calculate the answer to 10 simple arithmetic expressions.You have 4 difficulty levels.10 seconds time will be given for each question.And you will provide the answer followed by # sign.
